title: Territory
description: A grouping of customers within a given geography managed by a Sherwin Sales Representative

territoryId.description: Business key for territory.  Two-part natural key with businessUnit.

businessUnit.description: Sherwin business unit the territory belongs too.  Two-part natural key with territoryId.

name.description: Sherwin business name given for the territory

source.description: Source system the territory came from

heirarchyCode.description: The code for the heirarchy associated with this territory

location.description: Geographic region for the territory.  UNITES STATES, US, etc.

code.description: Unique identifier for a specific territory.  TODO: Feels like an ENUM

name.description: Human readable unique identifier for the location

owners.description: A collection of relationships to other territories.

type.description: Classification for the ownership.  TODO: Feels like an ENUM

code.description: Unique identifier for the ownership record

lastUpdatedDate.description: Date of the last change to the ownership record

workforce.description: A collection of Sherwin workers that have a relationship with the territory.

effectiveStartDate.description: Date the worker.s relationship with the territory began

effectiveEndDate.description: Date the worker's relationship with the territory ends

lastUpdatedDate.description: The date the terriroty was last modified in the source system
